Medium: Etching and aquatint from an illustrated book with twenty etchings (twelve with aquatint, one with heliogravure, and one with heliogravure and aquatint), one heliogravure, two zincographs, one woodcut, one aquatint wrapper, and eight reproductions
Title: Les boîtes en métal, 1947 (in-text plate, page 51) from Fautrier l'enragé
